explanation: [0-0] In a bathroom with grey tiles, a woman is leaning over, holding a cut bamboo tube to collect water from a tap into a blue bucket. However, the bamboo tube is too short to reach the bucket, and the water is not flowing into it. The woman is wearing a grey long-sleeved top and blue jeans. There is a window in the bathroom, and on a shelf in the corner by the window are some toiletries; the sprinkler is black.

[0-3] As the bamboo tube is not long enough, the woman repeatedly collects water from the tap and pours it into the bucket, spilling a lot of water in the process. A left hand holding two orange tubes appears from the right side of the frame, and the woman puts down the bamboo tube to take the tubes.

[3-5] Then, a close-up of the woman holding two orange tubes appears against a grey tiled wall. There is also a colorful suction cup-like object on the wall behind the woman's hand. The woman is forcefully bending the two metal tubes inwards.

[5-9] Next, the woman connects the tubes to a faucet. There is also a potted plant in the corner of the bathroom. Once assembled, the tubes can be bent at will, and the colorful suction cup-like object appears on the ground again. Finally, the tube is bent and attached to the faucet.

[9-12] A blue bucket appears in the frame, a hand stretches the tube and puts the other end into the bucket, turns on the faucet and water flows into the blue bucket.

[12-15] The camera pans out to reveal a white toilet on the floor. A woman is using an extended water pipe to wash clothes on the tiles, while a person on the right is washing dishes in a yellow basin with a sponge. The woman adjusts the direction of the extended water pipe and scrubs the clothes.
